Record.ClassificationPath: Endocrine System Diseases/Thyroid Diseases/Thyroid Dysgenesis/Lingual Thyroid/Lingual Goiter
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Congenital Abnormalities/Thyroid Dysgenesis/Lingual Thyroid/Lingual Goiter
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: Pathological enlargement of the LINGUAL THYROID, ectopic thyroid tissue at the base of the TONGUE. It may cause upper AIRWAY OBSTRUCTION; DYSPHAGIA; or HYPOTHYROIDISM symptoms.
